name: Explorable Forest Valley
description:
I created a detailed forest valley scene to be explored in first person as a walking sim. This project was an experiment using unreal engine 4 to achieve an overcast lighting look with some realistic forest assets.  I wanted to create an immersive experience by letting the player explore the scene at their own pace, accompanied with ambient sounds and music.

Reccomended Specs:

2GB graphics
8GB ram
3.2GHz intel i5

Feedback is appreciated!

I do lots of visual work similar to this, please check out my socials
